caption.title: Reactivity of sera against inactivated Dengue and Zika viruses by ELISA.
caption.p: IgM (A) and IgG (B) Optical Density ratio (ODr = OD (target) / OD (noise)) against DENV (abscissa) and ZIKV (ordinate) obtained by ELISA. Values are positive if ODr is â‰¥ 3 (dotted line) in an ELISA assay using total inactivated virus as target. The IgM group (n = 5,519) is included in the IgG group (n = 5,600). Three groups were assembled: ZIKV-IgM-positive (green, n = 50), flavivirus (red, n = 99), and negative (yellow, n = 50) groups.
